name: The Hermit (itch) (Petson, bubblesauur, Couchpirate, Haducken)
description:
The Hermit is a top down adventure game where you play as the hermit who has to flee his home because of the evil weasels who has invaded his forest.

When fleeing he ends up in a magical forest inhabited by magical forest spirits, with the help of the forest spirits the hermit has to fight off the weasels and escape the forest.
